processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @m int, @m1 int, @m2 int, @i int, @baseCurrency varchar(32), @u numeric(19, 4), @v numeric(19, 4) declare @unitCode varchar(32), @count int, @payID varchar(32), @stt_rec_phieu char(13), @stt_rec_hd char(13), @so_phieu char(32), @so_hd char(32)
select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @m = col_length('phsx', 'so_lsx'), @m1 = col_length('d53$000000', 'so_phieu'), @m2 = col_length('d53$000000', 'so_hd') select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName'
update @@table set so_lsx = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_lsx))) + rtrim(so_lsx), so_phieu = space(@m1 - len(rtrim(so_phieu))) + rtrim(so_phieu), so_hd = space(@m2 - len(rtrim(so_hd))) + rtrim(so_hd)
-- Struct create table #r(stt_rec_phieu varchar(32), so_phieu varchar(32), ngay_phieu smalldatetime, ma_nt char(3), ty_gia numeric(24, 12), tk varchar(32), tien_nt numeric(19, 4), ma_kh_phieu varchar(32), stt_rec_hd varchar(32), so_hd varchar(32), ngay_hd smalldatetime, ma_nt_hd char(3), ty_gia_hd numeric(24, 12), tk_du varchar(32), tien_hd_nt numeric(19, 4), da_tt_nt numeric(19, 4), cl_nt numeric(19, 4), ma_kh_hd varchar(32), tt_nt numeric(19, 4), ma_vv varchar(32), ma_bp varchar(32), so_lsx varchar(32), ma_sp varchar(32), ma_hd varchar(32), ma_phi varchar(32), ma_ku varchar(32), ref varchar(32), stt int)
select @q = 'insert into #r' select @q = @q + ' select distinct '''' as stt_rec_phieu, a.so_phieu, a.ngay_phieu as ngay_ct, '''' as ma_nt, 0 as ty_gia, '''' as tk, 0 as t_tt_nt, '''' as ma_kh, ' select @q = @q + ' '''' as stt_rec_hd, a.so_hd, a.ngay_hd as ngay_ct, '''' as ma_nt, 0 as ty_gia, '''' as tk_du, 0 as tien_hd_nt, 0 as da_tt_nt, 0 as cl_nt, '''' as ma_kh, ' select @q = @q + ' a.tt_nt, a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku, '''', a.stt' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a' exec sp_executesql @q
select @unitCode = case when @ma_dvcs = '' then @@unit else @ma_dvcs end
update #r set stt_rec_phieu = b.stt_rec, ngay_phieu = b.ngay_ct, tk = rtrim(b.tk), ma_nt = case when isnull(b.ma_nt, '') = '' then @baseCurrency else b.ma_nt end, ty_gia = isnull(b.ty_gia, 0), tien_nt = case when isnull(b.ma_nt, '') = '' then isnull(b.t_tt, 0) else isnull(b.t_tt_nt, 0) end, ma_kh_phieu = @ma_kh from #r a join cttt60 b on a.so_phieu = b.so_ct and b.ma_dvcs = @unitCode and b.ma_kh = @ma_kh and b.ngay_ct <= @ngay_lct and b.da_pb <> 1 and (a.ngay_phieu = b.ngay_ct or a.ngay_phieu is null)
update #r set stt_rec_hd = b.stt_rec, ngay_hd = b.ngay_ct, tk_du = rtrim(b.tk), ma_nt_hd = case when isnull(b.ma_nt, '') = '' then @baseCurrency else b.ma_nt end, ty_gia_hd = isnull(b.ty_gia, 0), @u = tien_hd_nt = case when isnull(b.ma_nt, '') = '' then isnull(b.t_tt, 0) else isnull(b.t_tt_nt, 0) end, ma_kh_hd = @ma_kh, @v = da_tt_nt = isnull(b.t_tt_qd, 0), cl_nt = @u - @v from #r a join cttt30 b on a.so_hd = b.so_ct and b.ma_dvcs = @unitCode and b.ma_kh = @ma_kh and b.ngay_ct <= @ngay_lct and b.loai_tt = 0 and b.tat_toan = 0 and (a.ngay_hd = b.ngay_ct or a.ngay_hd is null)
update #r set ref = ref + case when stt_rec_phieu <> '' then '1' else '0' end update #r set ref = ref + case when stt_rec_hd <> '' then '1' else '0' end
&CheckImportUserDefinedFields;
select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Grid$ImportResult(this.frameElement);' as script select case when tt_nt <> 0 then 1 else 0 end as tag, stt_rec_phieu, so_phieu, ngay_phieu, ma_kh_phieu, ma_nt, ty_gia, tk, tien_nt, stt_rec_hd, so_hd, ngay_hd, ma_kh_hd, ma_nt_hd, ty_gia_hd, tk_du, tien_hd_nt, da_tt_nt, cl_nt, tt_nt, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, ref from #r order by stt return
